title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
text: 'mlr3' package family set packages machine-learning purposes built modular fashion. wrapper package aimed simplify installation loading core 'mlr3' packages. Get information 'mlr3' project https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/.

title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
text: mlr3verse installs subset packages one hand frequently required perform data analysis, hand pull many dependencies system requirements. Additional extension packages include: Analysis benchmark experiments: mlr3benchmark Task interface data bases: mlr3db Connector OpenML: mlr3oml Additional learners: https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3extralearners Hyperband tuning algorithm: mlr3hyperband Spatio-temporal resampling: mlr3spatiotempcv

title: Print mlr3* package versions — mlr3verse_info
code: mlr3verse_info() #>              package version #>  1:            bbotk   0.6.0 #>  2:      mlr3cluster   0.1.4 #>  3:         mlr3data   0.6.1 #>  4:      mlr3filters   0.6.0 #>  5:      mlr3fselect   0.7.2 #>  6:    mlr3hyperband   0.4.2 #>  7:     mlr3learners   0.5.4 #>  8:         mlr3misc  0.11.0 #>  9:    mlr3pipelines   0.4.2 #> 10:       mlr3tuning  0.15.0 #> 11: mlr3tuningspaces   0.3.1 #> 12:          mlr3viz  0.5.10 #> 13:          paradox  0.10.0
